title: Ticket #588: condor_glidein manual page erroneously claims gt4 support
description: The condor_glidein manual page says "The Condor jobs to do both the set up and execute tasks utilize Condor-G and Globus protocols (gt2 or gt4) to communicate with the remote resource." At this time, only gt2 is supported. (#584 encourages adding gt4 support.)
creator: adesmet
